top_categories.workout_context: Iceman Cometh’s michigan singletrack, mountain bike demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Iceman Cometh isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Iceman Cometh — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Iceman Cometh’s michigan mountain bike singletrack and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Iceman Cometh — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on michigan mountain bike singletrack.
Cadence efficiency makes every pedal stroke at Iceman Cometh count — smooth technique reduces muscular fatigue over long distances.
Iceman Cometh’s michigan mountain bike singletrack drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Iceman Cometh rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Iceman Cometh when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Iceman Cometh. Make this intensity feel like home.
The varied gradients at Iceman Cometh reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Iceman Cometh’s michigan mountain bike singletrack delivers on race day.

race_overlay.nutrition: Standard hydration and fueling. One bottle per hour minimum. Gel or bar every 45 minutes at race intensity.
race_overlay.terrain: Highly technical terrain at Iceman Cometh demands practice on similar surfaces. Ride michigan mountain bike singletrack at race-day cadence weekly. Expect: michigan singletrack, mountain bike, 30-mile distance. Practice cornering, descending, and power delivery on unstable surfaces. Dial in tire pressure before race week — 5 PSI wrong costs you 15+ minutes over 30 miles.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and Critical Power to prepare you for 30 miles of michigan mountain bike singletrack in Kalkaska, Michigan.
